title: Diff. eq.: No context, from slope equation part - c

content.question: Find f(x) by solving the separable differential equation dy/dx = 3x2+1 / 2y with the initial condition f(1) = 4.

frqParts.text: Find f(x) by solving the separable differential equation dy/dx = 3x2+1 / 2y with the initial condition f(1) = 4.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables
